descriptionHtml:
Update: Dec 30, 2014 - Sorry for being out, just built a new computer and got a better connection, will do a follower soon.

Ignore any pop-ups that says missing blah-blah (you know when a mod is missing) as I forgot to turn off some mods (i.e 'A matter of Time, Customizable Camera, etc.)

Required
-Apachii Skyhair (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?)
-The Eyes of Beauty (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?)
-Brows (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?)

Mods used
-Apachii Skyhair (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?)
-The Eyes of Beauty (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?)
-Brows (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?)
-RAN Headmesh (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7127/) (HEADMESH D)
-Caliente's CBBE (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/) (SLIM)
-SG Female Texture Renewal (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?) (CBBE)
-Alternate Start (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9557/?)

Planning to make her a follower.
author: synsixxx
